snippet: India’s Supreme Court refused to resolve a dispute with Italy over the prosecution of two Italian marines accused of killing two Indian fishermen in 2012.
abstract: India's Supreme Court refuses to resolve a major international dispute over a shooting involving two Italian marines; top Italian diplomat warns refusal could soon damage ties; Indian officials say the case serves as a cautionary tale for the United States.
lead_paragraph: India’s Supreme Court refused to resolve a dispute with Italy over the prosecution of two Italian marines accused of killing two Indian fishermen in 2012.

headline.main: Dispute Over Italian Marines Prompts Bickering in Indian Court, but No Resolution
headline.print_headline: Dispute Over Italian Marines Prompts Bickering in Indian Court, but No Resolution
